fire.title: FIRE Calculator
fire.subtitle: Financial Independence, Retire Early — simulate your financial independence
fire.timeToFire: Time to reach 25× your annual expenses:
fire.noResultHint: Fill in the parameters and click "Calculate"

compoundInterest.title: Compound Interest
compoundInterest.subtitle: Simulate your investment growth with contributions and compound interest
compoundInterest.resultDesc: Projected value at end of term
compoundInterest.projectedValue: Projected value at end of term
compoundInterest.noResultHint: Fill in the parameters and click "Calculate"

usufruct.title: Usufruct Calculator
usufruct.subtitle: Calculate the usufruct and bare ownership values for donations and inheritances
usufruct.info: Usufruct is the right to use and enjoy property belonging to another person. Bare ownership is the right of ownership without the right of use. This calculation follows the IBGE table for lifelong usufruct.
usufruct.validationError: Please fill in all fields correctly.
usufruct.noResultHint: Fill in the parameters and click "Calculate"

itcmd.title: ITCMD Calculator
itcmd.subtitle: Calculate the Inheritance and Donation Tax
itcmd.info: ITCMD (Inheritance and Donation Tax) is a state tax charged on inheritances and donations. Rates vary by state and may have value brackets.
itcmd.noResultHint: Fill in the parameters and click "Calculate"

profitability.title: Profitability Simulator
profitability.subtitle: Compare different investment scenarios and profitability
profitability.info: Compare different investment profiles (Conservative, Moderate, Aggressive) and see how your wealth can grow in each scenario.
profitability.validationError: Please fill in the values correctly.
profitability.comparisonDesc: Final value and profit by profile
profitability.noResultHint: Fill in the parameters and click "Simulate"
